Author: eren0x
Title: [ANN][ICO] Peoplewave ICO Live on Qryptos - World first HR Blockchain token
Body: The HR function has become overworked, compliance-driven and too focused on talent acquisition – not employee development and people management. Today, user data cannot be taken for granted due to the scandals we read in the papers. HR performance data is kept by your company and you should own it but don't. Peoplewave was created to fix this.

Title: [ANN][ICO] Peoplewave ICO Live on Qryptos - World first HR Blockchain token
Body: Peoplewave has been named “Top 50 Most Promising Enterprise Start-ups in the Asia Pacific” by CIO Outlook Magazine and “Top 20 Hottest Startups 2018” by Singapore Business Review. Renowned ICO adviser, Simon Cocking has also joined the team in April 2018.

Author: eren0x
Title: [ANN][ICO] Peoplewave ICO Live on Qryptos - World first HR Blockchain token

Author: peoplewave
Title: [ANN][ICO] Peoplewave ICO Live on Qryptos - World first HR Blockchain token
Body: Hello Supernva   Thank you for your question. There are not many ICOs disrupting the HR space you can filter on a prominent rating site like icobench.com  There are ICOs that look similar to our model but are either white paper only or just completed an MVP. Our company has been around since Jan 2017 and has researched and built our products with existing clients and revenue to this stage before going for an ICO  Furthermore, we feel our product has developed the best approach towards data privacy regulations and feedback from clients from many industries regarding the usefulness of blockchain and HR information  With our product, a user can now control their performance data.  Have you been in a job where you performed well and left without proving you were good to  your new employer?   Peoplewave can fix this.   Read about us on www.peoplewaveico.io   Join our revolution right now!     Peoplewave Team
